summary: The customer was frustrated with Contoso Wireless and was considering leaving due to their current product offerings not meeting their needs. The agent offered a few solutions such as discounted rates, different plans with more data and coverage, and additional discounts on other products and services. The customer was still unsure if this was enough to make them stay, so the agent encouraged them to provide feedback so that Contoso Wireless can improve their services to better meet the customer's needs.
